mapper.sql: param_id, product_id, product_place, foot_period, brand, factory_name, factory_address, packaging_method, weight, storage_method, eat_method, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select distinct brand from fmmall.product_params where product_id in ( select product_id from fmmall.product where product_name like #{keyword} )
select distinct brand from fmmall.product_params where product_id in ( select product_id from fmmall.product where category_id=#{cid} )
mapper.insert: insert into product_params (param_id, product_id, product_place, foot_period, brand, factory_name, factory_address, packaging_method, weight, storage_method, eat_method, create_time, update_time) values (#{paramId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{footPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packagingMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eatMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
